page.title: 05COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: {Garth & Trevor Community Centre is situated at the edge of Rhos-y-coed housing estate and serves the need for a population of approximately 2500 people.The centre is used by many local organisations such as the{,Youth {Club,Darts Club,Senior Citizens and {the local}school.Concerts and Bingo Nights and rummage sales are also held there quite frequently. The pupils of{Garth School use it to perform their annual {Christmas Concerts}and they are well attended by parents and people from the village. There is a{library room}at the centre and it is used by the children quite a lot,but it is going to be{closed owing to lack of money. My dad says that it's a disgrace and he is going to protest .
